review: I'm a Prime subscriber, and can access Amazon content directly on my Vizio TV.  I purchased Amazon Fire TV because I am thinking of getting rid of cable.  I did not realize that it would massively improve streaming, and the overall experience of finding content at Amazon.  I love the voice search, which has no problem recognizing my Australian accent.  I love the layout of the content on the screen, and the ease of navigating through it.  I'm hooked.  And will probably get rid of my cable subscription.
author: Antonomasia "Anton"
